display_long_description:
Step into the unpredictable world of Bad Boy Life Simulator VR, a unique Sandbox fighting game where freedom, chaos, and comedy collide. Set in a vibrant Mediterranean-style city, you decide how to play: explore the streets, interact with NPCs, test your skills in open world VR fighting, or just cause mischief your way.

Explore the city with full of interactive adventures, test your strength in street fights, and experiment with hilarious ways to cause mischief. 

This isn’t just a brawler — it’s an interactive city adventure VR experience where every corner hides surprises. Earn rewards, upgrade your safehouse and girlfriend, and unlock new ways to create mayhem while laughing at the hilarious situations that unfold.

With intuitive controls, endless replayability, and plenty of crazy situations, Bad Boy Simulator VR delivers the best mix of action comedy VR fun and sandbox freedom. Whether you want to experiment, fight, or simply unleash your inner rebel, the choice is always yours.

Are you ready to dive into the ultimate chaos simulator VR? The city is waiting — how much mischief can you unleash?

The game is under development and we are constantly updating it based on your feedback. Join our discord server to send feedback and stay informed about further improvements to the game!
